: : Kup : :
Kup(via commlink): Great Windlord. Since Aerotaur has pulled out, Empath can take his place on this mission.
 "airly2000 <airly2002@...>" <airly2002@...> wrote:OOC:Scratch my last post wiht Windlord. I haven't read this, so I'll 
correct it.

IC:

WIndlord opened his commlink "Windlord, reporting... I'm ready to 
work"and looking to Emphath "Come, love, we leave this in the safe 
box and next we go to the meeting"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup: That's a good crew, they'll make this work.
> Kup opens a commlink to Ragnar, Wheeljack, Windlord, Owlhawk, and 
Aerotaur.
> Kup(via commlink): This is Kup. Please report to the WarRoom for 
mission briefing.
>  "Nic <wingedwarrior41@h...>" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:Katya: 
There would be you, me, Ragnar, Wheeljack, if he is done
> working on the shuttle, Owlhawk, if we can get him out of CR, 
Windlord
> and Aerotaur. What do you think of it?
>
